import React from "react"; function App() { const [state, setState] = useState({ name: "", email: "", subject: "", message: "", }); const { name, email, subject, message } = state; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (!name || !email || !subject || !message) { error("Please provide value in each input field"); } else { child("contacts").push(state); setState({ name: "", email: "", subject: "", message: "" }); success("Form Submitted Successfully"); } }; const handleInputChange = (e) => { let { name, value } = e.target; setState({ ...state, [name]: value }); }; return(
